column2: film2=[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
October 29]], [[1963]]) is a New Zealand actor. He portrayed [[Nori]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)
column3: ''The Hobbit (film series)'']]. He also played many roles in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column4: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], though he was only credited for the second film. His children, [[Sadwyn Brophy
column5: Sadwyn]] and Riley, also appeared in the films; the former as [[Eldarion]] and the latter as a Hobbit child. In June [[2007]], he and 14 other actors filed [http://us.imdb.com/news/ni0058227/ a lawsuit] against [[New Line Cinema]] over merchandising royalties.
